name: googlebooks-app
description: MERN Google Books search engine refactored to a GraphQL API

scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm run start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
